name: PR_EST_INFO_2
description: General information about the price estimate. Split from PR_EST_INFO.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: MATCHING_TREATMENT_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: This items stores the treatment estimate matched to the associated visit grouper estimate. It is only populated for dental estimates.

columns.name: PREPAY_UPDATE_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The source of prepay amount for the estimate.

columns.name: PREPAY_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The user that last updated the prepay amount.

columns.name: PREPAY_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the prepay amount was last updated.

columns.name: VAP_PROPOSED_AMT
columns.description: The proposed consent amount for visit auto pay that should be applied to the encounter.

columns.name: VAP_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The source of the visit auto pay proposed amount value. If the source is set to 1 - System Calculated - Visit, the visit auto pay amount is calculated based on configuration when the estimate is finalized. A user may override the visit auto pay amount at that point as well. If the source is set to 2 - User Override, a user specified an amount to use as the visit auto pay consent amount for the estimate's encounter.

columns.name: VAP_PROPOSAL_USER_ID
columns.description: The last user who updated the visit auto pay proposal on the estimate.

columns.name: VAP_PROPOSAL_DTTM
columns.description: The last instant the visit auto pay proposal associated with the estimate was updated, formatted with time zone attached.

columns.name: GROUP_NUMBER
columns.description: The group number for the coverage associated with this estimate.

columns.name: PAT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's legal sex.

columns.name: PAT_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: Date of birth of the patient.

columns.name: HB_SP_DSCNT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all hospital billing self-pay discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_SP_DSCNT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all professional billing self-pay discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: TOT_SP_DSCNT_AMT
columns.description: The total of all self-pay discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: HB_FIN_ASST_AMT
columns.description: The total of all hospital billing financial assistance discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: PB_FIN_ASST_AMT
columns.description: The total of all professional billing financial assistance discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: TOT_FIN_ASST_AMT
columns.description: The total of all financial assistance discount amounts on an estimate.

columns.name: MYCHART_REQ_LOC_ID
columns.description: The location for this estimate selected from MyChart.

columns.name: MYCHART_REQ_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider for this estimate selected from MyChart.

columns.name: NOTIF_CONTENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores what notification content was available when they are sent after an estimate was finalized.
entries: Notification sent with view estimate hyperlink only
Notification sent with prepay hyperlink only
Notification sent with both estimate and prepay hyperlinks
Notification sent with letter and prepay hyperlinks
